name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PlutoAI - AI Bookmarks and Tabs Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI bookmarking assistant that enables you to instantly save, highlight, annotate, retrieve web content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your tabs and bookmarks with PlutoAI, your personalized AI bookmark manager. 

Organize, manage, and access your saved content from the web effortlessly. Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to streamlined bookmarking with PlutoAI.

Manage browser tabs and sessions
- Save and resume browser sessions with one-click picking up precisely where you left off.

Smart Tags and Categories
- Automatically categorize and tag your saved bookmarks by topic, theme, or key elements to never lose an article again.

Full-text and Filter search
- Find anything and everything using text, tags, and filters.

Learn in under 30 seconds
- Get AI-powered content summaries and TLDRs for quick learning.

Content tailor-made for you
- Enjoy personalized content recommendations that 100% match your interests and preferences.

Smart alerts | Zero distractions
- Receive reminders to finish reading or watching incomplete articles/videos to help you stay on track.

Why Pluto AI?

Whether you’ve never saved an article before, you’ve saved stuff but forgotten about it, or have a hard time sorting your bookmarks — Pluto AI helps you get organized and keeps you going.

Pluto AI fuels your curiosity - by helping you save, manage, and retrieve content, all in one place - no matter what you’re interested in, we’ve got you covered!

From AI summaries to personalized recommendations of content that matters the most to you, Pluto AI is here to help you become your most organized and productive self!
